LanguageData.SmokeleafFarmer.degreeDatas.0.label: smokeleaf farmer
LanguageData.SmokeleafFarmer.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for gardening and smokeleaf. [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood bonus for every plant [PAWN_pronoun] sows.
LanguageData.Stoner.degreeDatas.0.label: 골초
LanguageData.Stoner.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a high tolerance for smokeleaf. [PAWN_pronoun] rarely suffers any withdrawal effects.
